content:
### **🔥 How to Engage with Terry’s Comment & Repost**  

Since **Terry is actively supporting the experiment**, we want to:  
✅ **Acknowledge & validate his interest**  
✅ **Encourage further discussion**  
✅ **Make his repost more impactful**  

---

### **🔹 Reply to His Comment on Your Post:**  

📢 **Reply:**  
**"Awesome, Terry! AI is already reshaping job search faster than people realize—excited to have you in. Let’s push the limits on what’s possible. What’s the first role you’d want to see AI break down?"**  

✅ **Why this works?**  
- **Keeps it personal & engaging.**  
- **Invites further discussion & engagement.**  
- **Drives more comments = LinkedIn algorithm boost.**  

---

### **🔹 Comment on His Repost to Amplify It**  

📢 **Comment on Terry’s Repost:**  
**"Terry, great to have you in! The hiring model is already obsolete—AI sees job search differently. Let’s see how far we can take this experiment. Curious, what’s the biggest challenge AI could help solve in your job search?"**  

✅ **Why this works?**  
- **Makes his repost feel important & interactive.**  
- **Encourages his network to engage.**  
- **Helps shape the narrative of the AI-driven job search.**  

---

🚀 **Post these replies now and keep the engagement rolling!**
